hanzi-su-wiki:
宵

Значения

Вечер, сумерки; мрак, ночь

Мнемоника

Зачатие ребёнка, маленького комочка мяса 肖, происходит дома 宀 в ночное время.

xiāo
night
ночь
rtega_mnemonic:
宵宵RSnight, evening, dark
  • small body 肖 at home 宀: night has fallen and it is dark
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 肖 indicates the sound; 宀 (roof) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
通宵 [ tōng xiāo ]: all night; throughout the night
元宵 [ yuán xiāo ]: Lantern Festival; night of the 15th of the first lunar month; see also 元夜 ; sticky rice dumplings
元宵节 [ yuán xiāo jié ]: Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春节 , on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
通宵达旦 [ tōng xiāo dá dàn ]: overnight until daybreak (idiom); all night long; day and night
宵禁 [ xiāo jìn ]: night curfew
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 宀 [gàimian2] roof; house
    • 肖 [ xiào ] to resemble, to look like; to be like
heisig_keyword: wee hours | EARLY EVENING, вечер, предночные (не предрассветные) часы
heisig_chinese_memo: I burn the CANDLE in my HOUSE throughout the nighttime reviewing the hanzi!!!
heisig_constituent: wee hours, house, resemblance, spark, candle, small, little, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisig_story: As the key word hints, the kanji in this frame refers to the late evening or early morning hours, well after one should be in bed asleep. It does this by picturing a house with a candle in it. The reason is obvious: whoever is living there is "burning the candle at both ends," and working night after night into the wee hours.
koohiiStory1: I burn the CANDLE in my HOUSE until the WEE HOURS reviewing the kanji!!!
koohiiStory2: I agree with elktapestry. This kanji really means "early evening", not "wee hours" [Heisig really should have done his homework on this and several other characters (e.g., #145 "but of course" -- what the hell???). Oh well.] "Every house lights candles in the EARLY EVENING which stay lit until the wee hours". E.G. 宵の口（よいのくち）early evening; 今宵（こよい）this evening; tonight.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: something resembling (肖) a roof (宀) is good to be under in the wee hours
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I burn the CANDLE in my HOUSE throughout the nighttime reviewing the hanzi!!!
humanum_full_description_en: Inscriptions from " http ", " Xiao " sound, " Xiao " original meaning moonlight reduction, " night " from the word " Xiao ", refers specifically to the moon may weaken or missing moonlight night (see Kim Kuk-tae). Bronze inscription is used as a person’s name. Xiao makes a trip to the Yi implement: "Xiao Zha (as) a trip to Yi." "Shu Wen": "Xiao, Ye Ye. From Luo, Luo Xia Ming Ye; Xiao Sheng." "Poetry·Binfeng" ‧July": "The day is in the mao, and the night is so." Mao Chuan: "Supper, night."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions start with the sound of "宀" and " Xiao ". The original meaning of " Xiao " means moonlight disappearing.
humanum_full_description: 金文從「宀」，「肖」聲，「肖」本義為月光消減，「宵」字從「肖」，可能專指月光減弱或不見月光的夜晚(參金國泰)。金文用作人名，宵作旅彝器：「宵乍(作)旅彝。」《說文》：「宵，夜也。从宀，宀下冥也；肖聲。」《詩‧豳風‧七月》：「晝爾于茅，宵爾索綯。」毛傳：「宵，夜。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「宀」，「肖」聲，「肖」本義為月光消減。

金文從「 宀 」，「 肖 」聲，「 肖 」本義為月光消減，「 宵 」字從「 肖 」，可能專指月光減弱或不見月光的夜晚(參金國泰)。金文用作人名，宵作旅彝器：「宵乍(作)旅彝。」《說文》：「宵，夜也。从宀，宀下冥也；肖聲。」《詩‧豳風‧七月》：「晝爾于茅，宵爾索綯。」毛傳：「宵，夜。」
Inscriptions from " http", " Xiao" sound, " Xiao" original meaning moonlight reduction, " night" from the word " Xiao", refers specifically to the moon may weaken or missing moonlight night (see Kim Kuk-tae). Bronze inscription is used as a person’s name. Xiao makes a trip to the Yi implement: "Xiao Zha (as) a trip to Yi." "Shu Wen": "Xiao, Ye Ye. From Luo, Luo Xia Ming Ye; Xiao Sheng." "Poetry·Binfeng" ‧July": "The day is in the mao, and the night is so." Mao Chuan: "Supper, night."

宵字的基本解释

宵
xiāo
夜：通宵达旦。春宵。宵夜。宵禁。宵衣旰食（天不亮就起来，天黑了才吃饭，形容勤于政务）。宵遁。元宵。夜宵。

宵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》相邀切，平宵，心。］
(1)夜。
(2)小。参见“宵雅”。
(3)通“綃”。丝织品的一种。参见“宵衣”。
[②]［xiào］
［《字彙》先弔切］
通“肖1”。
相似。

◎ 宵
night

宵字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宵； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页286第15
〔古文〕?【唐韻】相邀切【集韻】【韻會】思邀切【正韻】先彫切，?音消。【說文】夜也。从宀。宀，下冥也。肖聲。【書·堯典】宵中星虛，以殷仲秋。【註】陽氣消也。【詩·召南】肅肅宵征。【周禮·秋官·司寤氏】禁宵行者。【註】宵，定昏也。　又【莊子註】不由明坦之路曰宵。　又小也。【禮·學記】宵雅肄三。【註】宵之言小也，習小雅之三。　又宵行，蟲名，如蠶，夜行，喉下有光如螢。【詩·豳風】熠耀宵行。　又與綃通。【儀禮·士昏禮】姆纚筓宵衣。【鄭註】宵，讀如素衣朱綃之綃。

宵字的源字形

宵字的起名意思

：指入夜时段，大概在晚饭后的八、九点钟；入夜、入寝。

night
xiāo
Night: all night long. Spring night. Supper. Curfew. Night clothes and food (wake up before dawn, eat only after dark, described as diligent in government affairs). Night escape. Lantern Festival. Supper.

night
Source glyph
night
Name meaning
: Refers to the night time, about eight or nine o'clock after dinner; at night and going to bed.
宵
形声字。一表意,古文字形体像房屋,表示入夜后人多在屋内;肖(xiao )表声,肖有相似义,表示夜晚屋内屋外同样幽
暗。本义是夜晚。

EA
ночь
Пиктофонетические символы.
На идеограмме древние иероглифы напоминают дом, что означает, что после наступления темноты в доме находится больше людей; Сяо (сяо) выражает звук, Сяо имеет аналогичное значение, что означает, что в доме темно ночью.
Первоначальное значение - ночь.
Е: Запрет на "Тонг ~ | Хорошо ~".
